ARABIC: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيْضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And he drew out his hand and there it was, pure white to those who looked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And he drew forth his hand, and behold, it looked white to those who beheld it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then he drew out his hand, and it appeared luminous to all beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then he uncovered his hand and it appeared sheer white to the onlookers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And putting his hand in his bosom, withdrew it – so it shone brightly before the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And he drew out his hand, and behold! it was white (with radiance) for the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And he drew forth his hand, and lo! it was white to the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And he drew forth his hand, and lo, it was white to the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he drew forth his hand (from his bosom), and lo! it was white for the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and he drew forth his hand, and it appeared [shining] white to the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And he drew forth his hand, when lo: it was white unto the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then he drew out his hand, and behold, it was white to the onlookers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And he drew out his hand, and behold! it was white to all beholders!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And he drew out his hand, and behold! it was white (with radiance) for the beholders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then he drew out his hand and it was luminous to the onlookers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And He pulled out his hand, and it was white to the onlookers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he drew out his hand; thereupon it was white [with radiance] for the observers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:108] And he drew forth his hand, he took it out from his bosom, and lo! it was white, radiant, for the beholders, and not its usual skin colour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And he drew forth his hand) from his armpit: (and lo! it was white) shining (for the beholders) who looked at it.
